text: Cristian Dros (born 15 April 1998) is a Moldovan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Latvian club Spartaks Jūrmala.Mihai Hecsko și Cristian Dros și- au găsit echipe după ce au fost puși pe liber. Fostul jucător al Ripensiei a ajuns în Liga 3, iar fostul fundaș de la ASU Poli a părăsit România. liga2.prosport.ro In his career Dros also played for Zaria Bălți and ASU Politehnica Timișoara. ==References== == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Sportspeople from Bălți Category:Moldovan footballers Category:Moldova youth international footballers Category:Moldova under-21 international footballers Category:Moldova international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Moldovan National Division players Category:FC Zaria Bălți players Category:Liga II players Category:ASU Politehnica Timișoara players Category:Latvian Higher League players Category:FK Spartaks Jūrmala players Category:Moldovan expatriate footballers Category:Moldovan expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania Category:Moldovan expatriate sportspeople in Latvia Category:Expatriate footballers in Latvia
title: Cristian Dros
